FuncDef:
The l2tp tunnel-limit command limits the maximum number of L2TP tunnels established on the LNS.
The undo l2tp tunnel-limit command restores the default configuration.
By default, 49152 L2TP tunnels can be established.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the maximum number of tunnels that can be established.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 49152.

ExtraInfo: When the device functions as the LNS, the system performance is degraded if too many L2TP tunnels are established on the equipment. To solve this problem, you can limit the number of L2TP tunnels.
